amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete funding for the Appalachian Regional Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the $35 million appropriation for the Appalachian Regional Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 298 (Roll no. 519).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 298 (Roll no. 519).
